title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on LSA Operations
content:
Join up with the Los Santos Angels in high-flying LSA Operations to board an aircraft carrier under the cover of darkness, call in an airstrike, and use an EMP to force a blackout on a government outpost.

Use the Operations Terminal inside your Avenger or contact Charlie Reed from your iFruit to launch LSA Operations and reap 2X GTA$ and RP through August 28.
